content: summer flower top is a granny square crochet top made of cute flower granny squares what makes the top so special is the color set the floral part of the square is made of scheepjes stone washed and river washed yarns i bought scheepjes colour pack stone washed river washed yarn pack that contains 58 little cute yarn balls of different colors you have so many options to choose from to create the perfect color combination for the top the black parts of the top are crocheted using novita cotton soft yarn the hook size is 3 0 mm i have included crochet instructions for two sizes xs-s or s-m the top shown in the pic is size xs-s the larger size is crocheted by adding additional round for the granny square so the amount of squares remain the same in both sizes the smaller size is quite flat from the chest so there might be no room for bras the finished top in size xs-s measures approx 71 cm around the top when not stretched and in size s-m it measures approx 80 cm when not stretched the pattern terminology is us the pattern includes both written instructions and handwritten crochet charts feel free to share your creation on social media and use #summerflowertop so i can see your creations
